mapper.insert: insert into tb_printer (id, name, ip, port, shop_detail_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tb_printer
id, name, ip, port, shop_detail_id, print_type, ticket_type, `range`, receive_money, bill_of_account, bill_of_consumption, support_tangshi, support_waidai, support_waimai, state, spare_ip,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ticketType}, #{range}, #{receiveMoney}, #{billOfAccount}, #{billOfConsumption}, #{supportTangshi}, #{supportWaidai}, #{supportWaimai}, #{state}, #{spareIp},
mapper.update:
update tb_printer
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_detail_id = #{shopDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, print_type = #{printType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ticket_type = #{ticketType}, `range` = #{range}, receive_money = #{receiveMoney}, bill_of_account = #{billOfAccount}, bill_of_consumption = #{billOfConsumption}, support_tangshi = #{supportTangshi}, support_waidai = #{supportWaidai}, support_waimai = #{supportWaimai}, state = #{state}, spare_ip = #{spareIp}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_printer set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_detail_id = #{shopDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,print_type = #{printType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from tb_printer where shop_detail_id = #{shopDetailId} and print_type=#{printType} and `range` = 0

select count(1) from tb_order where production_status = 5 and shop_detail_id = #{shopId} and DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%m-%d-%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(push_order_time,'%m-%d-%Y') and print_times = 0 and order_state != 9
select * from tb_printer where shop_detail_id = #{shopId} and print_type = 2 and `range` = #{type}
select * from tb_printer where shop_detail_id = #{shopId} and ticket_type = 0 GROUP BY ip
select * from tb_printer where shop_detail_id = #{shopId} and ticket_type = 1 GROUP BY port
select * from tb_printer where shop_detail_id = #{shopId} and print_type = #{type} and ticket_type = 0
mapper.update: update tb_printer set spare_ip = #{spareIp} where ip = #{ip}
